trans-unit.source: SQL Server 2005/2008 will deploy table elimination in this situation as well. We have not found a way to make Oracle 11g use it for this type of query. Queries like these arise in two situations. Either when you have a denormalized model consisting of a fact table with several related dimension tables, or when you have a highly normalized model where each attribute is stored in its own table. The example with the subselect is common whenever you store historized/versioned data.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 2005/2008也会在这种情况下部署表消除。我们还没有找到让Oracle 11g在这种类型的查询中使用它的方法。像这样的查询出现在两种情况下。要么是当你有一个由一个事实表和几个相关维度表组成的去正常化模型,要么是当你有一个高度正常化的模型,其中每个属性都存储在自己的表中。子选择的例子在存储历史化/版本化数据时很常见。

trans-unit.source: SSLv3.0 is known to be vulnerable to the POODLE attack, so it should not be used. SSLv2.0 and SSLv3.0 are disabled for MariaDB Server binaries linked with OpenSSL since MariaDB 5.5.41, MariaDB 10.0.15, and MariaDB 10.1.4. If you are using a MariaDB version older than that and you cannot upgrade, then please see the section titled "SSL 3.0 Fallback protection" in OpenSSL Security Advisory - 15 Oct 2014.
trans-unit.target: 众所周知，SSLv3.0容易受到POODLE攻击，因此不应使用它。自MariaDB 5.5.41，MariaDB 10.0.15和MariaDB 10.1.4 开始，与OpenSSL链接的MariaDB Server二进制文件禁用了SSLv2.0和SSLv3.0 。如果您使用的MariaDB版本早于该版本，并且无法升级，请参阅OpenSSL Security Advisory-2014年10月15日中标题为“ SSL 3.0后备保护”的部分。

trans-unit.source: SSLv3.0 is known to be vulnerable to the POODLE attack, so it should not be used. SSLv2.0 and SSLv3.0 are disabled for MariaDB Server binaries linked with yaSSL since MariaDB 5.5.41, MariaDB 10.0.15, and MariaDB 10.1.4.
trans-unit.target: 众所周知，SSLv3.0容易受到POODLE攻击，因此不应使用它。自MariaDB 5.5.41，MariaDB 10.0.15和MariaDB 10.1.4 开始，对于与yaSSL链接的MariaDB Server二进制文件禁用了SSLv2.0和SSLv3.0 。

trans-unit.source: SST methods are supported via a scriptable interface. New SST methods could potentially be developed by creating new SST scripts. The scripts usually have names of the form wsrep_sst_<method> where <method> is one of the SST methods listed below.
trans-unit.target: 通过可编写脚本的界面支持SST方法。通过创建新的SST脚本，可以潜在地开发新的SST方法。这些脚本的名称通常为 wsrep_sst_<method> 形式，其中 <method> 是下面列出的SST方法之一。

trans-unit.source: SST methods of this type physically copy the data files from the donor node to the joiner node. This requires that the joiner node is initialized after the transfer. The mariabackup SST method and other a few other SST methods fall into this category. These SST methods are much faster than the mysqldump SST method, but they have certain limitations. For example, they can be used only on server startup and the joiner node must be configured very similarly to the donor node (e.g. innodb_file_per_table should be the same and so on). Some of the SST methods in this category are non-blocking on the donor node, meaning that the donor node is still able to process queries while donating the SST (e.g. the mariabackup SST method is non-blocking).
trans-unit.target: 这种SST方法将数据文件从施主节点物理复制到连接节点。这要求在传输后初始化连接器节点。该 mariabackup SST方法等其他几个SST方法属于这一类。这些SST方法比 mysqldump SST方法快得多，但是它们有一定的局限性。例如，它们只能在服务器启动时使用，并且联接器节点的配置必须与供体节点非常相似（例如innodb_file_per_table应该相同，依此类推）。此类别中的某些SST方法在施主节点上是非阻塞的，这意味着施主节点在捐赠SST的同时仍然能够处理查询（例如 mariabackup SST方法是非阻塞的）。

trans-unit.source: SST scripts can't currently read the [mysqldN]option groups in option files that are read by instances managed by mysqld_multi.
trans-unit.target: SST脚本目前不能读 [mysqldN] 选项组中的选项文件正在由管理情况看 mysqld_multi 的。

trans-unit.source: SUBCLASS_ORIGIN indicates whether the SQLSTATE uses a standard subclass or a software-specific class. If the SQLSTATE is defined in the SQL standards document ISO 9075-2 (section 24.1, SQLSTATE), this property's value is supposed to be 'ISO 9075', otherwise it is supposed to be 'MySQL'. However, any string is accepted.
trans-unit.target: SUBCLASS_ORIGIN表示SQLSTATE是使用标准子类还是软件专用类。如果SQLSTATE是在SQL标准文档ISO 9075-2中定义的(第24.1节,SQLSTATE),这个属性的值应该是'ISO 9075',否则应该是'MySQL'。但是,任何字符串都可以接受。

trans-unit.source: SUBTIME() returns expr1 - expr2 expressed as a value in the same format as expr1. expr1 is a time or datetime expression, and expr2 is a time expression.
trans-unit.target: SUBTIME（）返回 expr1 - expr2 ，以与 expr1 相同的格式表示为值。 expr1 是时间或日期时间表达式，而expr2是时间表达式。

trans-unit.target: SUPER-拥有此权限的用户和复制线程可以调整时间戳。

trans-unit.source: SYSDATE() returns the time at which it executes. This differs from the behavior for NOW(), which returns a constant time that indicates the time at which the statement began to execute. (Within a stored routine or trigger, NOW() returns the time at which the routine or triggering statement began to execute.)
trans-unit.target: SYSDATE（）返回执行时间。这与NOW（）的行为不同，后者的行为返回一个恒定时间，该时间指示语句开始执行的时间。（在存储的例程或触发器中，NOW（）返回例程或触发语句开始执行的时间。）

trans-unit.source: SYSTEM_USER() is a synonym for USER().

Safe use of ALTER is for indexing, as we have seen earlier, and to change options such as MAPPED or HUGE those do not impact the data format but just the way the data file is accessed. Modifying the BLOCK_SIZE option is all right with FIX, BIN, DBF, split VEC tables; however it is unsafe for VEC tables that are not split (only one data file) because at their creation the estimate size has been made a multiple of the block size. This can cause errors if this estimate is not a multiple of the new value of the block size.
trans-unit.target: ALTER的安全使用是用于索引,正如我们前面所看到的那样,以及修改MAPPED或HUGE等选项,这些都不会影响数据格式,只是影响数据文件的访问方式。修改BLOCK_SIZE选项对于FIX、BIN、DBF、拆分的VEC表是没有问题的,但是对于没有拆分的VEC表(只有一个数据文件)是不安全的,因为在创建时,估计大小已经变成了块大小的倍数。如果这个估计值不是块大小的新值的倍数,就会造成错误。

trans-unit.source: Safely Purging Binary Log Files While Replicating
trans-unit.target: 在复制时安全地清理二进制日志文件。

trans-unit.source: Scalability. By having one or more slave servers, reads can be spread over multiple servers, reducing the load on the master. The most common scenario for a high-read, low-write environment is to have one master, where all the writes occur, replicating to multiple slaves, which handle most of the reads.

trans-unit.target: 其次，如果使用 unix_socket 身份验证插件的身份验证失败，则将其配置为尝试使用 mysql_native_password 身份验证插件。但是，最初设置的密码无效，因此，为了进行身份验证，必须使用 SET PASSWORD 设置密码。

trans-unit.source: Second, in some cases the server only wants to know if the table exists, but it does not really need to open it and will not use its .frm file image. trans-unit.target: 其次，在某些情况下，服务器仅想知道表是否存在，但实际上并不需要打开它，也不会使用其 .frm 文件映像。然后，使用 discover() 方法可能会过大，并且服务器使用轻量级的table_exists_in_engine（）方法。此方法定义为

trans-unit.source: Second, the maximum amount of data that an InnoDB table can store in a row's main data page depends on the value of the innodb_page_size system variable. At most, the data that a single row can consume on the row's main data page is half of the value of the innodb_page_size system variable. With the default value of 16k, that would mean that a single row can consume at most around 8 KB on the row's main data page. However, the limit on the row's main data page is not the absolute limit on the row's size.
trans-unit.target: 其次，InnoDB表可以存储在行的主数据页中的最大数据量取决于 innodb_page_size 系统变量的值。最多，一行的主数据页上可以使用的数据是 innodb_page_size 系统变量的值的一半。默认值为 16k ，这意味着一行的主数据页面上最多可以消耗大约8 KB。但是，行主数据页面上的限制不是行大小的绝对限制。

trans-unit.source: Second, when combining server command-line options (which may come from many different sources) into one long list before starting mysqld, mtr treats --plugin-load specially. Normal server semantics is to use the latest value of any particular option on the command line. If one starts the server with, for example, --port=2000 --port=3000, the server will use the last value for the port, that is 3000. To allow different .opt files to require different plugins, mtr goes through the assembled server command line, and joins all --plugin-load options into one. Additionally it removes all empty --plugin-load options. For example, suppose a test is affected by three .opt files which contain, respectively:
trans-unit.target: 其次，在启动 mysqld 之前将服务器命令行选项（可能来自许多不同的来源）组合到一个长长的列表中时，mtr 特别对待 --plugin-load 。正常的服务器语义是在命令行上使用任何特定选项的最新值。如果使用例如 --port=2000 --port=3000 来启动服务器，则服务器将使用该端口的最后一个值，即3000。要允许不同的 .opt 文件需要不同的插件，mtr会通过组装的服务器命令行，并将所有 --plugin-load 选项合并为一个。此外，它会删除所有空的 --plugin-load 选项。例如，假设一个测试受三个 .opt 影响 文件分别包含：

trans-unit.source: Segment state; one of ACTIVE (contains active transaction undo log), CACHED, TO_FREE (insert undo segment can be freed), TO_PURGE (update undo segment won't be re-used and can be purged when all undo data is removed) or PREPARED (segment of a prepared transaction).
trans-unit.target: 段状态；之一 ACTIVE （包含活动事务撤消日志）， CACHED ， TO_FREE （插入还原段可以被释放）， TO_PURGE （更新还原段将不会被重新使用，并且可以清除当所有还原数据被移除）或 PREPARED （段准备好的交易）。

trans-unit.source: Select count(*) is internally optimized to be select count(COL-N) where COL-N is the column that uses the least number of bytes for storage. For example it would be pick a char(1) column over int column because char(1) uses 1 byte for storage and int uses 4 bytes. The implementation still honors ANSI semantics in that select count(*) will include nulls in the total count as opposed to an explicit select(COL-N) which excludes nulls in the count.
trans-unit.target: Select count(*)内部优化为select count(COL-N),其中COL-N是使用最少字节数存储的列。例如,它会选择char(1)列而不是int列,因为char(1)使用1个字节的存储,而int使用4个字节。该实现仍然尊重ANSI语义,因为select count(*)将在总计数中包含空值,而不是显式select(COL-N)在计数中排除空值。

trans-unit.source: Semi-join Materialization is a special kind of subquery materialization used for Semi-join subqueries. It actually includes two strategies:
trans-unit.target: 半联接实现是半联接子查询中使用的一种特殊的子查询实现。它实际上包括两种策略：

trans-unit.source: Semi-join Materialization is a subquery materialization used for Semi-join subqueries
trans-unit.target: 半连接材质化是用于半连接子查询的子查询材质化。

trans-unit.source: Semi-join materialization is a somewhat special case, because "join prefix" is not exactly what you see in the EXPLAIN output. For semi-join materialization:
trans-unit.target: 半连接实体化是一个比较特殊的情况,因为 "连接前缀 "并不完全是你在EXPLAIN输出中看到的东西。对于半连接的具体化。

trans-unit.source: Semi-join operations are similar to regular relational joins. There is a difference though: with semi-joins, you don't care how many matches an inner table has for an outer row. In the above countries-with-big-cities example, Germany will be returned once, even if it has three cities with populations of more than one million each.
trans-unit.target: 半连接操作类似于常规的关系连接。但有一个不同之处:使用半连接,你不关心内表对外表行有多少个匹配。在上面的 "有大城市的国家 "的例子中,德国将被返回一次,即使它有三个城市,每个城市的人口超过一百万。

trans-unit.source: Semi-join optimizer offers a rich set of execution strategies for both correlated and uncorrelated subqueries. The set includes FirstMatch strategy which is an equivalent of how EXISTS suqueries are executed, so we do not lose any opportunities when converting an EXISTS subquery into a semi-join.
trans-unit.target: 半连接优化器为相关和不相关的子查询提供了一套丰富的执行策略,其中包括FirstMatch策略,相当于EXISTS suqueries的执行方式。这套策略包括FirstMatch策略,它相当于EXISTS suqueries的执行方式,所以当我们将EXISTS子查询转换为半连接时,不会失去任何机会。

trans-unit.source: Semisync replication ('semisync_slave.so') doesn't yet work with multi-source.
trans-unit.target: Semisync复制('semisync_slave.so')还不能与多源一起工作。

trans-unit.source: Semisynchronous Replication Options and System Variables
trans-unit.target: 半同步复制选项和系统变量。
半同步复制插件状态变量
半同步复制插件的状态变量

trans-unit.source: Semisynchronous replication can be enabled by setting the relevant system variables on the master and the slave.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过在主站和从站上设置相关系统变量来启用半同步复制。

trans-unit.source: Semisynchronous replication can be enabled on the master by setting the rpl_semi_sync_master_enabled system variable to ON. It can be set dynamically with SET GLOBAL. For example:
trans-unit.target: 通过将 rpl_semi_sync_master_enabled 系统变量设置为 ON ,可以在主服务器上启用半同步复制。可以使用 SET GLOBAL 动态设置。例如：

trans-unit.source: Semisynchronous replication can be enabled on the slave by setting the rpl_semi_sync_slave_enabled system variable to ON. It can be set dynamically with SET GLOBAL. For example:
trans-unit.target: 通过将 rpl_semi_sync_slave_enabled 系统变量设置为 ON ,可以在从属服务器上启用半同步复制。可以使用 SET GLOBAL 动态设置。例如：

trans-unit.source: Semisynchronous replication is no longer a plugin in MariaDB 10.3.3 and later. This removes some overhead and improves performance. See MDEV-13073 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 半同步复制不再是MariaDB 10.3.3和更高版本中的插件。这消除了一些开销并提高了性能。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-13073。

trans-unit.source: Semisynchronous replication was first released in MariaDB 5.5 as a plugin.
trans-unit.target: 半同步复制最初是在MariaDB 5.5中作为插件发布的。

trans-unit.source: Semisynchronous replication was significantly enhanced in MariaDB 10.1.3. See MDEV-162 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 半同步复制在MariaDB 10.1.3中得到了显着增强。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-162。

trans-unit.source: Send a FLUSH PRIVILEGES statement to the server after dumping the mysql database. This option should be used any time the dump contains the mysql database and any other database that depends on the data in the mysql database for proper restoration.
trans-unit.target: 转储mysql数据库后，向服务器发送FLUSH PRIVILEGES语句。每当转储包含mysql数据库和任何其他依赖mysql数据库中的数据进行正确还原的数据库时，都应使用此选项。
